name: webapp
author: Tim Geiter, Bruno Da Silva Vieira

scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean:databaseContent
scripts.lint: semistandard --verbose webapp/src/js/**/*.js | snazzy && semistandard --verbose server/src/**/*.js | snazzy && lesshint --reporter lesshint-reporter-stylish  webapp/src/styles
scripts.format: semistandard --verbose --fix webapp/src/js/**/*.js | snazzy && semistandard --verbose --fix server/src/**/*.mjs | snazzy
scripts.predebug: npm run clean:dist && npm run lint
scripts.debug: npm run html && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run debug && npm run minify
